channel.title: Come on already! Just admit it!
channel.description:
You havent done ANYTHING in terms of working on BM for years. If you have ever done anything on it at all.
A nice demo video for your portfolio doesnt even remotely prove that you ever intended to create BM. Show me some video of a real person actually playing the mod.
If you refuse to do either, I will simply continue to call you out every couple of months. I mean it. I will bug you incessantly; well once or twice a year at least. Thats about how often I remember to check to see if you have posted any videos yet.
Put your money where your mouth is HOAXERS!

item.title: Come on already! Just admit it!
item.dc:creator: little_scrapper
item.description:
Hell I bet I could make some screen shots.

Here check this one out i just made:

And i dont even need fancy software. i just use MS Paint; The real mans photoshop.

Read full topic
